description:
The Kanto Area Qualifiers start, it is a single elimination tournament leading up to the National Games. Misaki fights in the very first match versus the idol, Ringo Seto and her Angel, Ranga.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Cante, Misaki! O Deus É Um Ídolo?!
Chante Misaki ! L`adversaire est une star !
Sing Misaki! The Deus is an Idol
Sing, Misaki, sing! Der Deus ist ein Popidol!
歌え! みさき デウスはアイドル!?
